article.title: EADS to Provide Helicopters with Radios
article.text: EADS-North America, Herndon, Virginia, was awarded a $55,361,816 sole-source modification (P00780) to contract W58RGZ-06-C-0194 to procure 10 UH-72A Lakota helicopters with ARC-231 radios. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
